content.html: "Twitter in its current form is a dumpster fir that the more than 7K employees still haven't put out after years of trying almost nothing. Yet much of the coverage is focused with hysterical intensity on the dangers of not doing more of the same." world.hey.com/dhh/need-it-ta…
